inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: attending an appointment in a centre participating to the trial

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: giving his informed consent and accepting the modalities of the study

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: agreeing to attend up to 4 appointments dedicated to the study, during 8 weeks after the initial appointment (motivational interview)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: agreeing to be registered within the system of text-based recalls for the duration of the study

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no calculus removal procedure less than 1 month ago

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no allergy to benzoic acid preservatives

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no high risk of infective endocarditis

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no change in geographical location during the duration of the study

notes: Patient is a 16-year-old girl recently diagnosed with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and weakness affecting her upper extremities.
